title: Microsoft | L62 | Hyderabad
content:
Education: B.Tech Tier-3
Previous Compensation: 28 LPA
YOE: 5 Years
Prior Experience: SDE-1 Amazon (Gurgoan)


Date of the Offer: January 2025
Company: Microsoft
Title/Level: SDE 2 (L62)
Location: Hyderabad
base Salary: 3800000
Relocation: 450000
Signing Bonus: 500000-year1, 200000- year2
Stock bonus: $80K stock grant vested over 4 years
Bonus: Performance-based bonus up to 20% of salary every year
Benefits: standard micro benefits

Other Offers: 
* Amex GBT (Pending)

			Role: SDE-3
			Location: Gurgaon
			Offer expected soon. Seeking advice on company culture.
* BlinkIt

		Role: SDE-2
		Base Salary: ₹38 LPA
		Year-End Bonus: ₹14 LPA
		Location: Gurgaon
		
* Kotak

		Role: SDE-2
		Location: Hyderabad (Gurgaon hiring on hold)
		Compensation not discussed, but expected to be competitive.

Current Location: Gurgaon
- Questions:
	- Can anyone provide insights into the work culture at Amex GBT?
	- If I decline Microsoft, will they blacklist me?

Note: I will share all my interview experiences and details of other offers in the coming weeks.
